.. published: 2026-01-01 0:00:00 UTC
.. summary: Recommended Linux distributions for mobile devices.
.. title: Recommended Linux mobile distros
.. type: text

This is a sample article that showcases a custom XSLT stylesheet which is
intended for multimedia media galleries.

This gallery is realized by setting preambles of "links" with rel "related"
and "image" of the same title.

.. code:: rst

   title,href,rel,type
   NemoMobile, /graphics/nemomobile.svg, image, image/svg+xml
   NemoMobile, https://nemomobile.net, related

Schapps recommends and endorses these operating system, although there is no
attempt to judge or compare them based on any criterion other than freedom; the
software herein are listed by the ease of installation and common purposes for
mobile devices.
